Title: Crungle Mode!
Description:
[i]You awaken from a fitful dream...[/i]

[b]Crungle Mode![/b] adds a new game mode in which you assume the role of a random inhabitant of Qud. Play in Crungle Mode by selecting the "Crungle Mode!" option when beginning a new game.

Source code: https://github.com/kernelmethod/QudMods/tree/main/CrungleMode

[h2]Preferences[/h2]

This mod comes with a number of different options you can set to change how this mod works. From the Options menu, go to "Mods: Crungle Mode!" and select the settings you want to play with.
